website_summaries.verdict: This toaster comes with many features, such as the Cool Touch.
pros: Several settings help you personalize to your preferences, such as the ability to only toast one side of the bread
Has settings for frozen items as well
Crumb tray slides out for easy cleaning
cons: Some users note that it can toast unevenly

customer_reviews.title: Nice toaster for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good toaster. Gets hot fast, toasts evenly on both sides, and I especially like the settings for frozen items. The slots are 1.5 inches wide. This is fine for most things but I sometimes have problems fitting NY bagels in there. This is called a "cool touch" because the outside plastic doesn't get hot. Watch out though, the metal on top gets extremely hot. I found out the hard way the first time i used this toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Flyguy

customer_reviews.title: Some heating elements were not working.
customer_reviews.text: Thought this would be a good purchase, but noticed that the heating elements were not all working, or not working at the same heat level, making one side of the toast less toasted than the other. Amazon allowed me to return it with no problem, even though it was past the 30 day return period since it wasn't working correctly. I do wish there was a toaster that allowed for LONGER slices in addition to WIDER slices, such as bagels. Pumpernickel and similar breads don't fit so you have to bend and scrunch them into the slot.
customer_reviews.author: Mcbrown

customer_reviews.title: 4.5 stars...
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I love this toaster. Granted, the last toaster I had was from maybe 15 years ago and it was a piece of junk, so just about anything else would make me happy...but...I did shop around a little bit when I bought this one and it seemed to fit my needs. The only complaint I have is that the bagel setting doesn't really get the bagel hot. It toasts just the insides, which is great, but when I take the bagel out, it's somehow not warm. Nothing melts - not even butter. I just use the regular setting now, which is all I had before, so I can't really complain too much. 4.5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: gmu20

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Beach 4 slice cool touch toaster
customer_reviews.text: First toaster I have had for over 20 years. It is okay but it burns the toast if you put the dial on a higher number than 1. If 2 it burns and if 1 you need to push the toast down twice but you have to time the second time you do this or it burns. I usually like Hamilton Beach. Not too impressed with this one. I will try just putting in frozen bread to see how it works. Better I hope.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary R. Cameron

customer_reviews.title: the toaster to toast away your blues
customer_reviews.text: I have been suffering from depression. On a whim, i decided to buy this product. The moment i received it, the first thing that i noticed is that how BIG it was. Maybe feeling so downtrodden in my life has given me new respect for things that stand tall and proud. I apprehensively thrust a bread into it to test its powers. Out it came, all brown and crunchy. With every crunch, the haze of my pain lifted away. Although it came on a whim, it is here to stay.
customer_reviews.author: srishti

customer_reviews.title: Great dependable toaster for the price
customer_reviews.text: Toasty goodness... This toaster has been nice. it toasts my bread evenly because of the slice holders the keep the bread in place. The crumb tray makes it perfect for easy clean up. and I've been using it consistently every morning ever since I got it and it hasn't failed on my yet. Usually toasters of this price don't last long and show signs of wear and tear in the first couple of uses. This toaster shows no signs of that
customer_reviews.author: MikeTech1212Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Lukewarm bagel after toasting and strange odor
customer_reviews.text: Never had a toaster this bad, ever. With most toasters the bagels are so hot to touch that they are painful to touch when removing from the toaster. Butter doesn't even melt on the bagel. Also strange smell. I am happy with a basic toaster but this toaster doesn't even do a basic job of toasting. I do not trust this toaster plus it does not work. I trusted the good reviews previously posted, but the proof is in the taste of the pudding. This item is too cheap. It does not toast. And I question its safety. I recommend looking elsewhere rather than take a chance on this nonfunctional toaster with a strange odor.
customer_reviews.author: ExternalValidity

customer_reviews.title: Worst toaster I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: It worked for one day. After that, it either barely toasts the bread, or it burns it on one side while the other side isn't even toasted. It's hard to clean because the trays are so flimsy. The first time I cleaned one tray, it cracked. The other one is fine, but it's hard to get it back in properly. This toaster is far too expensive for how awful it is.
customer_reviews.author: Speechless

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but amazon basics is better
customer_reviews.text: Nice toaster, unfortunately it doesn't raise up high enough for me. At highest position it's about 3 1/4" deep, with a 3 1/2" english muffin inside, that only leaves 1/4" sticking out. Kind of hard to get out without a quick burn or grabber of some sort, Fine for toast, and nice looking. I returned and got the amazon basics toaster, not as good looking, but only 2" deep when fully raised, piece of cake to get english out. It also has a V top on the raiser bar, so pancakes etc. don't slide off and get stuck, another big plus for me.I suppose it depends on your use.
customer_reviews.author: Sonnyoneso

customer_reviews.title: War time tested!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this toaster to be able to toast bread here in Afghanistan where I am deployed. Not only did it toast our DFAC bread just wonderfully, but it toasted bagels, someone put a pita wrap in it, and it toasted that, it has warmed up pancakes, and generally made our lives a little more worth while. It is easy to clean, easy to operate, and easy to transport. The only thing I would change is the length of the cord, it is a tad bit short for where our outlets are!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE “FROZEN TOAST” SETTING IS AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Other toasters burn frozen bread. This one does not, because it has the “frozen toast” setting, which I assume uses a lower temperature to defrost the toast before toasting it. I am extremely happy with it, especially after using another toaster recently that left my frozen bread charred in places. Also the “automatic toast boost” (quite a spectacular name) is great because you don’t have to lift up the handle to raise the toast.
customer_reviews.author: Drowsy in Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Great Toaster, One Flaw
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Gets the job done and looks sleek in the kitchen. The ONLY complaint I’d have is that there’s no way to pop the toast up further if you’re trying to get it out. I’ve had to stab in with a knife and lift it out a few times if I’m toasting an English muffin or something smaller than bread. If I just haven’t figured it out then please feel free to say something or pretend I gave it 5 stars. :) aside from that, great toaster for the price, definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: EVan

customer_reviews.title: Controls do not work
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to control settings. After trying for many months to get a piece of toast that was not either burnt or still almost white we threw it out. Using the same setting it was impossible to get the same results. It seemed to work at first and then got worse and worse. If it was used twice in a row using the same setting, the results were totally different.
customer_reviews.author: Judie

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this product. I have tried to toast both frozen bread and fresh bread. Even on the highest level I had to run it through two cycles to get the bread slightly toasted. I used the frozen bagel setting for a frozen bagel and it came out very lightly browned but still frozen inside. Also, the first few times I used it I could smell burning plastic. I had to throw the toast away because I was afraid to eat it.
customer_reviews.author: G. G. Dyak

customer_reviews.title: Ok BUT 1 big flaw
customer_reviews.text: Been using for 3 wks now. Generally works fine except for one HUGE annoyance. The chrome piece on the top that has the 2 toast slots slightly overhangs the actual toaster slots. If you toast mini bagels, English muffins, etc that don’t extend out of the top of the toaster when done, they will catch on this chrome top piece when you try to get them out, making them very hard to remove while still hot. This is really annoying — you need tongs to extract them while they’re still warm. HB should fix this annoying flaw in subsequent models.
customer_reviews.author: Julia A

customer_reviews.title: Quirky toaster
customer_reviews.text: This is the strangest toaster that i've ever owned. If you are bothered by uneven toasting then please look elsewhere. The outside two slots toast darker than the inside. The bagel button doesn't really work well. I toast bagels on 4 without the bagel button and they come out perfect. For toast, you have to start on 3 and then decide from there because one piece will be toasted and the other will be lightly toasted. I find it more humorous than annoying but for some people it might be bothersome. Overall it works just fine, haven't had any problems with burning or items getting stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Bookgamer

customer_reviews.title: Not good for bagels
customer_reviews.text: For toasting bagels, this toaster is very inadequate. On the bagel setting, it barely warms the bagel, let alone toasts it. It is also difficult to remove items from the toaster because it doesn't have the push up function that other toasters have. The crumb tray is okay, but not 100% successful. It will suffice if all you want to do is make toast, but even for that purpose I would prefer a different toaster that pushes the toast up for removal.
customer_reviews.author: Bullsfan13

customer_reviews.title: Didn't expect to get so good a value for my money!
customer_reviews.text: Bought used and we couldn't be happier with it. It does everything easily and quickly. No complaints at all. The varied settings - "Bagel," "Frozen Bagel," and "Frozen Toast," all work perfectly. The crumb tray empties easily, and the casing is easy to keep clean. Best of all, using Amazon Warehouse, I got an incredible toaster for $12! I'd definitely buy another for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: HOT
customer_reviews.text: NOT cool touch. I burn my fingers with each use. The top is very hot.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Seeger- Boughton

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster but. . .
customer_reviews.text: . . .the Cancel button quit working a couple years in and it's almost impossible to get the toaster to turn off in the middle of a cycle without it. It's a nice little unit and I'd buy it again and just hope that control didn't break on me again.
customer_reviews.author: prsmith

customer_reviews.title: Not what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this toaster because my home-baked bread was not toasting in my current toaster. The new toaster not only didn't toast the bread, but the lever didn't stay down when I pushed it. I returned it for another toaster, which had a different problem. I am not in toaster heaven this month. On the bright side, the return was very efficient and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Lana Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what you expect it to.
customer_reviews.text: I tried an all metal Hamilton Beach brand toaster that was terrible (cooked very unevenly) but this toaster is great for the price! I have to use gluten free bread, which seems difficult to toast correctly based on my experience so far. The only thing I don't like is that the bagel setting turns off the outside toasters. I like both sides of my bagel toasted.
customer_reviews.author: mouthymerc

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much no matter what I set it to (1 ...
customer_reviews.text: Eh. This does the job of toasting bread and bagels, but the control settings seem totally arbitrary. Pretty much no matter what I set it to (1 or 5 or anywhere in between) my toast or bagel comes out a medium to dark brown. Rarely burnt, and I always eat what comes out of it, but I have no control really over how toasty things come out. I will keep using it though because it was cheap and I don't want to spring for a nicer one yet.
customer_reviews.author: Chyna

customer_reviews.title: It hasn't broken but the toast is lousy!
customer_reviews.text: We've had this toaster for several months now and it's performed well - except - it takes quite a bit longer for the toast to pop up, the toast is usually a nicely brown on one side and too light on the other, and it is always badly warped, at any heat setting. This toaster replaced a very, very cheap, two-slice toaster that finally gave up after many years of dependable service. In spite of it's low price it gave us terrific toast. This one does not. Yeah....I'm disappointed and more than a little irritated.
customer_reviews.author: old arkiedan

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only 5 months
customer_reviews.text: This toaster lasted about 5 months before it started malfunctioning. No matter what number of darkness you chose, the toaster pops the toast up at random times. Sometimes it pops it up before the toast gets toasted, but most of the time the toast is burning and I've got to hit cancel and try to pop the burnt toast up. We have spent more on burnt bread than we did on the toaster!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Three

customer_reviews.title: Terrible toaster.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible toaster, would strongly advise against buying it. When it was still working properly, toasting options were limited to: dry out the bread without toasting it, or burn it. Now after just a few months, the popping mechanism has broken, so unless I think to go back and manually end the toasting, any distraction from toasting results in burnt to the crisp. I wish I had never traded in my old toaster for this.
customer_reviews.author: Kay in Cali

customer_reviews.title: this toaster is dangerous
customer_reviews.text: the toaster works okay ; (albeit a little hard to find right shade). The major problem with this toaster is that the lifter DOES NOT return bread or english muffins high enough to pull out of toaster! The lift is surronded by a metal flange that is higher than lift, causing burns if one tries to pull toast out with fingers. You have to unplug toaster and use a fork to get toast out (especially muffins and bagels). I do not recommend this toaster.
customer_reviews.author: bob from fort myers

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After just 2 years the temperature control and the cancel button no longer work. In addition, the bread toasts unevenly. Worked great to start with. I'm disappointed in Hamilton Beach. I have to buy a new toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Judy L

customer_reviews.title: Looks sharp, cooks unevenly
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to upgrade to a modern toaster after my ex took my old-fashioned two slicer away. It certainly looks sharp as it sits on my counter. However, I am a bit disappointed in its ability to make toast. When making two slices in the left half of the unit, I'm finding that they are not cooking evenly. One is dark and one is light. And sometimes, a slice will be much darker on one side than the other. My old 1980's model did not have these problems.
customer_reviews.author: Todd S.

customer_reviews.title: Nearly burned our house down (TWICE!)
customer_reviews.text: Terrible toaster. Purchased hoping that we wouldn't have to spend more on a toaster but this is not worth it. Only toasted well the first month or so and since then it's never consistent and has nearly burned our house down (TWICE!) after failing to pop up the toast. After 6mo of use I am quickly tossing in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Kait

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS THING!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for many types of bread products. Bagels, buns, bread, frozen waffles and pancakes, and the outside stays cool. Great quality with a "frozen" setting, a "cancel" setting, and is very adjustable for every kind of toast - browned as you like it. I bought a cover for it but do not use it because I use this thing so often.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: How hard is it to design a toaster?
customer_reviews.text: With settings the same, it burns toast half the time. Toaster is 1.5yrs old. Toasters are about as simple as it gets and if a company can't build a reliable toaster, what CAN they build right?
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Won't stop toasting
customer_reviews.text: A toaster usually has a single job to do... broken into two parts: 1) Start toasting when the 'toasting lever' is pushed down 2) Stop toasting when the toast reaches the pre-set level of toasted-ness. This toaster does a great job at part 1, but fails spectacularly at part 2. For a while, it would make a faint 'click' when the toast was done and it was a fun game to see if you could hear it, but it doesn't even do that any more
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dirty. Appeared to be used.
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak about function as I returned it as soon as I took it out of the box. This toaster looked like it was used, cleaned up a little and put back in the box. Never saw anything this bad from amazon shopping.
customer_reviews.author: grrrrin ky

customer_reviews.title: I am so disappointed in this toaster
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in this toaster. Retuned the first one I received and Amazon quickly replaced it, per my request! The problem was that the lever that holds the bread down so it can be toasted would not stay down. After receiving the replacement toaster all was good for about six weeks and again the lever would not stay/lock down. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Kepner

customer_reviews.title: Badly delivered.
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered in an old used package, it looked like someone used it then repackaged it badly. The toaster was damaged and there was a woman red hair in it, I was surprised and didn't realize that it was used. I ordered replacement immediately and I have to return the first one.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Alsarah

customer_reviews.title: Not A Brave Little Toaster, but it works well
customer_reviews.text: A little larger than expected, and the cord IS impractically short, but then ... it WAS made in China. I had to buy a short, heavy duty, extension I didn't need in the kitchen. Overall, a good toaster for the money. The elements have irregular hot spots on mine, but it toasts within a tolerable evenness. It has JUST the right amount of function buttons to become the most practical kitchen device I now have. Others are correct about BURNING OFF before using. WITHOUT ANY BREAD --- I set mine on 5 (HIGH) + FROZEN for the task, and set off the fire alarm ... without any smoke.
customer_reviews.author: BSchauerte

customer_reviews.title: Good choice.
customer_reviews.text: I like this toaster. The coils light up fairly evenly, so both sides of the item being toasted get about the same amount of heat. There is a setting for frozen items like waffles, which is a nice touch. The toaster is small enough to avoid hogging counter space, but big enough to handle fat bready items. The electric cord could be a bit longer. That's the only slight improvement I can suggest.
customer_reviews.author: Gotta Tellya

customer_reviews.title: Nice toast at a decent price
customer_reviews.text: My last toaster finally died. I wanted my new one to be able to toast bagels, so it needed to be wide. I liked that the lever was nice and wide. No one agrees on how dark their toast should be and the settings for this are perfect. Half of the house thinks it should be 1 the other 2. The higher settings are great for frozen items. I did find that it was a lot bigger than my old toaster, which I did not expect. At least it still fits in my kitchen cabinet without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Lora Ann

customer_reviews.title: Terrible toaster.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this toaster on April 1. Today is July 26 -- I have had it less than 5 months. the cancel feature does not work at all -- the button does nothing. No matter what setting I use, the toaster keeps browning until the toast is burnt. Since the cancel button doesn't work, I either unplug it or manually lift up the bar. I will not continue to use this piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lusker

customer_reviews.title: Love this toaster
customer_reviews.text: Love this toaster. Its hard to find a good 4 slot toaster. This toasts thin items without them getting lost and it toasts thick bagels. It toasts frozen items really well which we love. We pre-slice and freeze bagels to toast quickly when we need and this works great.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Great Toaster
customer_reviews.text: We've used it for six months now and it toasts evenly which was our problem with the Cuisine Art 4 slice toaster we had. It's a little slow but WORKS. Only negative is that it doesn't have the pop op feature to easily get your toast out.
customer_reviews.author: Joby97

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 18 months of minimal use
customer_reviews.text: This product lasted 18 months and then stopped working. It is just my wife and I so we really don't toast that much. I can not recommend a toaster that seems to have been built to just die. Very disappointed in Hamilton Beach, won't likely buy another product from that brand. All previous toaster I have had lasted years.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great Toaster For The Price
customer_reviews.text: As other's had mentioned, I looked at some more of the expensive toasters, but did not get a warm fuzz about spending that much on a toaster that would not get a lot of use. I settled on this one and have been very happy. I love the way you can empty the crumbs from the front trays. Makes near perfect toast and bagels are flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Zorin

customer_reviews.title: WARNING! Almost burnt down my house!
customer_reviews.text: WARNING! This toaster almost burnt down my house. It filled the house with smoke. The pop up lever got stuck, so when the time was done toasting it never turned off.
customer_reviews.author: Matt F

customer_reviews.title: Those who bought it before me were right!
customer_reviews.text: All the positive reviews determined me to buy this. Thank all of you for posting your reviews. This is a superb toaster. While I do find one half of one of the toasting units a little lighter than the other, that's a very minor quibble. Bagel setting does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from Hamilton Beach!
customer_reviews.text: This toaster was crap! It died before it was even a year old (middle elements didn’t work) Then they sent us a new one for free (different model) and that one lasted 17 months (outside elements didn’t work). It’s not like we use it a ton either, kids have waffles every couple of days! I will be staying away from Hamilton Beach toasters.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Morse

customer_reviews.title: BAD BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: We really like this toaster. Does a great job for us. The one thing we like over our old toaster is that when the toast pops up, its up high enough where we can grab it rather than having to dig it out like the old toaster. Couldn't find this toaster in any store so to get it at Amazon, free shipping, no driving and great service, it's a recommend from me. UPDATE: We have had this toaster about a year now and now only one side of the bread gets toasted which happens in both slots. For me, I won't be buying any Hamilton Beach stuff. For the price I sure didn't get my money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Lake Drummer

customer_reviews.title: Expect to replace annually.
customer_reviews.text: Left half of toaster quit working 1 year after purchasing. We have hardly used the toaster - only using occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Christoph

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: My previous stove had a toaster feature on it. My new stove doesn't so I broke down and bought a simple toaster. It works just fine. I keep my bread in the freezer since I live alone, and this toaster has a "frozen" setting which works perfectly. Got a nice cover from Amazon too.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Fire safety hazard
customer_reviews.text: The toaster started out working great, no complaints about form or function. However, after three months the ejector mechanism intermittently stopped working and the causing toast to burn to a black before I manually canceled it. I'm certain if I hadn't have been in the same room, it would have burst into flames in another 60 seconds there being so much smoke.
customer_reviews.author: Galvy

customer_reviews.title: The levers on this toaster are big and strong.
customer_reviews.text: My last toaster did not feel like it was high quality. This one has strong levers and I don't feel like I am going to break it when I press on the lever.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa Andree

customer_reviews.title: Most inexpensive toaster I could find and guess what.  It toasts bread.
customer_reviews.text: The days of a $12 to $15 toaster are gone. I was horrified the see that some toasters were selling for $150. That's insane. This was purchased for $29 and toasts bread just as good as any other expensive model. There was a slight burnt plastic smell in the air the first several uses but that went away. Just works the way a toaster should.
customer_reviews.author: MarineVet

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy... will burn your waffles and bread
customer_reviews.text: This item had a lot of bad reviews but I purchased it anyway. For less than $25 it was worth the risk. It has been frustrating since month 3. It will not stop toasting and pop the food out. So much food has been ruined. On a setting of 2 you would expect a light toasting. Sometimes you get it, sometimes you don't. Many times its the smell of burning toast or waffles that reminds you. Blech, get a different toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Works ok so far. Came with some plastic smell ...
customer_reviews.text: Works ok so far. Came with some plastic smell during the first toasting but dissipated. Toast results vary a lot between putting one or two slices of bread at a time or between the first run and the subsequent run. Toasted a butter bread to carbon at 3. Don't know if that's normal since this one is my first.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre at best. I like some of the features (bagel and ...
customer_reviews.text: Mediocre at best. I like some of the features (bagel and frozen options) but the results of basic toasting is very poor! Uneven toasting is an under-statement. When I put two slices of bread on one side of the toaster, one side of one slice toasts nicely, the other side is much lighter, both sides of the other slice is hardly toasted at all. This results in my having to rotate the bread partway though toasting and maybe even using the bagel option to finish toasting to try to even it out. If I hadn't disposed of the box, it would have been returned.
customer_reviews.author: Ginia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Versatile and a great value.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Can toast large bagels and frozen items without problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S.

customer_reviews.title: Uneven toast anyone?
customer_reviews.text: This toaster doesn't toast evenly. The elements on the outside seem to get hotter than the ones on the inside so one side always comes out darker. I got used to toasting in low setting, flipping the bread and toast them again. Kind of a pain. On the positive side, the bagel setting is useful (only the elements on the inside turns on) and the crumb tray is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: J. Yun

customer_reviews.title: Loved this toaster!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this toaster! I eat bagels almost every morning for breakfast and this is the first toaster I’ve had that has a setting specifically for bagels which blew my mind and I have loved. I also like the removable tray at the bottom so you can get rid of crumbs that have fallen into the toaster on both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia

customer_reviews.title: so good, only had it for a month
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good, only had it for a month. Toasts well and sides are cool. Will update my review if I have any problems. It was good while it lasted, toasted well, but only lasted 1 1/2 yrs. It started to go bad before that, noticed it wouldn’t stay down after awhile and then it would work again. Basically made with cheap parts probably. Saw similar Hamilton Beach toaster but they just moved the buttons! So buyer beware! No thanks!! switching to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: SylvesterandTweetysMom

customer_reviews.title: Getting just what is necessary.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product. Of course I could pay much much more for a toaster, but all of them do the same thing,"toast", that's all I wanted to be able to do and this one does it fine. I like the accuracy of the settings, the way it pops up when ready, the crumb trays in front. All in all, unless I feel that I need a digital device that has bells and whistles, this toaster is perfect, and the price is right in line with the quality. Thanks for this product.
customer_reviews.author: bill p.

customer_reviews.title: No major issues
customer_reviews.text: So far, I haven't had many issues with this toaster. The things I don't like about it is that the "cancel" button is not very noticeable, and people keep trying to manually pop up the levers if they want them before they are done, and I'm afraid that they won't last very long if that keeps happening. It's sort of counterintuitive to do that with a toaster. I still don't have the hang of the "frozen" part either, I can't see much of a difference between that and the regular setting.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca J.

customer_reviews.title: but it is working just fine I've had it for over a month and I ...
customer_reviews.text: When I first received this toaster and took it out of the box I was a little worried because it was kind of lightweight and I was hoping it would be a little more heavy and substantial for the price, but it is working just fine I've had it for over a month and I have had no problems
customer_reviews.author: C. D.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and works great!
customer_reviews.text: It was cheap and does the job. For $12, you get a pretty good toasted that toasts any kind of bread - even thick ones like bagel or baguette!
customer_reviews.author: MrsDuxSF

customer_reviews.title: This is truly an awesome toaster. It evenly toasts my bread and frozen ...
customer_reviews.text: This is truly an awesome toaster. It evenly toasts my bread and frozen bagels with the toaster sides definitely stay cool to touch. Why on earth would you want to buy any other toaster. Not me!!
customer_reviews.author: ILoveMovies

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but cleaning is an issue
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this bread toaster since last 4 years. It works great, requires less space on the kitchen counter. I would give 1 star less as the cleaning is bit tedious.
customer_reviews.author: Kavita

customer_reviews.title: Dependable toasting quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great toaster. Toast comes out evenly browned. Does bagels well either crispy in middle or soft...your choice. Cancel button is handy and ability to lift toast up with handle is helpful too.
customer_reviews.author: bar

customer_reviews.title: Does its job.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED: bought my grandma one she loves it!! For the price you pay it gets the job done. It isn’t nearly as risky as my toaster oven was, if I would put a bagel in there and walk away I would come back and the toaster oven would have my bagel black. I can walk away and come back and my bagel will be lightly toasted. For the price you can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley G

customer_reviews.title: Really good No Frills Basic at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Community of four different adults using this on the run every day for breakfasts and snacks, the toaster is basic (which we wanted) and so far most efficient. We all manage various breads lightly-but-well toasted at a setting between 1 and 2; bagels between 2 and 3. Front opening crumb trays are a good thing. Good value for its cost.
customer_reviews.author: A  Listener

customer_reviews.title: has some useful controls and works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for a few weeks now. It's an attractive appliance, has some useful controls and works as expected. I do like the individual slide-out crumb trays. You do have to remember to empty them regularly though. The toast "darkness" settings go from 1 - 5, anything over about 3 tends to burn toast, bagels or waffles. Settings 4 and 5 may be useful for thick, frozen pastries or something similar. I would buy this again, very satisfied so far.
customer_reviews.author: DJJJS

customer_reviews.title: This toaster sucks.
customer_reviews.text: I usually never listen to bad reviews for a product that has way more good reviews but I should have listened to the bad reviews for this toaster. As you can see from my pics it does a terrible job. I am returning it. Half the elements in my old toaster weren't working and it did a better job than this toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Curled my Eggo's
customer_reviews.text: Simply put... It's a toaster. My only gripe is how it clamps on the bread. The clamps are wide enough for bagels or Texas toast. When you press down on the handle, the clamp closes at the top only. At the bottom, the wire clamp is still as wide as ever. My frozen Eggo's sagged down into this wide spot as they thawed and come out curled.
customer_reviews.author: Rob-n-TX

customer_reviews.title: This toaster toast the most evenly of any toaster I've ...
customer_reviews.text: This toaster toast the most evenly of any toaster I've ever had in my life. Which is strange because I'm actually used to somewhat uneven toast where the middle might be more toasted than the edges and there are burn lines or something. But it's completely even both sides golden brown. My only negatives, wish the toast cage or whatever went up a little higher and the lever is bulky and not very appealing but it doesn't affect how it works
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: This toaster is perfect! We've been using it for almost 3 months
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is perfect! We've been using it for almost 3 months, and for the first time in years, we've found a toaster that toasts evenly on both sides, and at a reasonable price. The more expensive toasters we've had in the past have always been a disappointment. This one is also attractive, looks good on the counter, and is easy to clean, with a convenient crumb tray. Would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Defective from the start do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a backup toaster for when my other toaster quit. When I started using the heating elements on one side would not work so the bread was only slightly toasted on one side. By the time I started using it too much time went by and I could not return it.
customer_reviews.author: XZy34

customer_reviews.title: Wearing out after a year.
customer_reviews.text: Update - It's been a year and the side of the toaster I have used most doesn't brown nearly as much, anymore. I switched to using the other side this week and it's significantly darker which tells me this thing is already wearing out. And after a year, I'm tired of my toast taking so long. First world problems, I know but I can vacuum my first floor before the toast is done. It is a really big toaster! But a great value and I dont have to flip my toast around and send it down again to get it even. :)
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this toaster
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this toaster. So far can't find anything that I don't like about it. I did have to adjust the settings for things, which is probably what everyone would have to do as our tastes are all different. The frozen setting doesn't get things as crispy as I like so once I run that I also let it toast again on the 1-2 setting, depending on what it is and how thick it is. Other than that, an awesome toaster! Really love how easy it is to clean the pull out trays. Toaster area stays much cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking toaster.
customer_reviews.text: White bread comes out much lighter on the inner side. Muffins have to be run twice (using the bagel button so only the inner element is on) to get reasonably toasted. Using the 'frozen bagel' button doesn't seem to make any difference. Usable, but not as good as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald G.

customer_reviews.title: I am jaded because our first toaster lasted more than ...
customer_reviews.text: I am jaded because our first toaster lasted more than 25 years. This one was purchased 4/2016 and you never know how dark (or not) your toast will be. All lemons on the slot machine.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this not even 5 months ago and now one side doesn't even work!! Comeplete waste of my money so now I'm shopping for a new one. Will NOT be Hamilton Beach brand. Do not buy!!! Oh and it only toasts one side!!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Mead

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is ok for the price. We have to use tongs to get the smaller bread out of the toaster. I was trying to find a decent toaster, but even the ones with lots of good reviews have reviews that indicate that the product would be unsafe.
customer_reviews.author: Kashbee

customer_reviews.title: Very slow!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS TOASTER! 3 settings. Frozen toast, frozen bagel, bagel. Advertised as fast; just the opposite. No frozen waffle. Who keeps their bread in the freezer? I should have returned it the first time I used it. My $3 Goodwill toaster did a better job.
customer_reviews.author: james m royal

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Work for Poptarts
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t handle Poptarts well. They drop too far into the toaster and then won’t pop up. They break apart in the toaster and I had to turn it upside down and hit the bottom to get it out. Considering Poptarts is a good group for my daughter, this won’t work for me. It might work well for other things.
customer_reviews.author: I was the second gunman

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Toasting function worked properly, but setting buttons arrived nonfunctional. Unit is also made of cheaper plastic than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mousetrap

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy - get something better
customer_reviews.text: I have had this toaster 6 months now. This toaster does not toast both sides evenly. It is not deep enough for bread slices, so the top of the bread does not get toasted. The "cancel " button works intermittently, having to press it several times to make it work. And now the there is no consistency with the browning setting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster!  Great price!
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is very easy to use. The slots are extra wide for bagels that come out perfect. This is a great toaster and for 30 dollars it's well worth the value. It does just as good as the last 100.00 toaster I bought without paying the extra money. It's very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Super Mom!

customer_reviews.title: Love this toaster!
customer_reviews.text: I love this toaster! My favorite part would be the removable crumb trays - it's never been so easy to clean my toaster before... in fact I'm not sure why all toasters don't have these, now (though I'm used to buying super cheap toasters). Honestly, I get the perfect toast from this every time, and it has a Frozen Bagel setting, which is fantastic! The price is right, too - all in all, a fantastic buy, and I would highly recommend this toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Shiva

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Worked okay for 7 months, but now the "outer" heating elements do not turn on any more. The inner elements still heat up but this makes the toaster pretty useless.
customer_reviews.author: CDamazonshopper

customer_reviews.title: It suits my needs for a while. I know ...
customer_reviews.text: It suits my needs for a while. I know it won't last long since it's made from China. Hope to see more product made from USA since we build quality product. update on this toaster purchase: I bought In January 2017 well it just went belly up. Thus it lasted 16 months not too bad for Chinese junk.
customer_reviews.author: bill Leland

customer_reviews.title: faulty, do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this toaster for a few months now, and I am not happy with it. I bought the 4 slice, but the bread in the middle does not heat correctly (at all) so the bread is not even when it pops out. I have found I have to cook the toast on the outside (with no slices in the inside slots) for it to cook the same on both sides, at the same time. That defeats the purpose of buy a toaster that can hold 4 slices. replacing this today - would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo

customer_reviews.title: Where the lady I take care of
customer_reviews.text: This is the read the toaster that was the first one that was broken I had to from Hamilton Beach through the same thing that broke so yes I would like my money back on both of them because I spent over $42 on both I like to sit there and make the lady I take care of toast in the morning because she loves it all the time toast and coffee morning noon and night that is what she has.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Tantlinger

customer_reviews.title: it looks nice and it works
customer_reviews.text: I've had this toaster for a few months now. It's lightweight, it looks nice and it works...but WOW, is it slow to toast. It has a few settings that I haven't seen before (frozen toast, frozen bagel) which may slow the time down to allow for defrosting? I don't know why but it takes a good 5 minutes to toast an english muffin. That may not seem like a long time but it is! I'm looking for a replacement now :(
customer_reviews.author: Ann McGovern

customer_reviews.title: Simple
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is simple, looks good, and makes good, evenly toasted bread. As someone who prefers his toast medium dark, I'm finding that I need to use a lower setting than the manual recommends to get it that way. But setting it to an even lower setting makes good, light toast, so anyone should be able to get what they want from this toaster. Toasting is quick. Cleanup is easy. It's hard to find fault with this toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Lost in Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster for the price.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? It is a toaster and it makes toast just fine. Love the look and color. Matches our kitchen appliances. The crumb trays are a huge plus. They make cleaning a much more pleasant experience. The settings takes a bit to find just where you like your toast done at, but once you figure that part the rest is easy as toast! The cool touch is greatly appreciated. No more melted bread wrappers...SWEEEET!
customer_reviews.author: Heavysteel

customer_reviews.title: Shiny black beauty
customer_reviews.text: This replaces my Kichenaide toaster. My other toaster broke off the push down handle in the first month of use. I hope this one lasts much better. The toast is evenly colored on both sides. It seems to heat evenly. Bagels work well and there is plenty of room. Cleaning trays remove easily. Black color looks sleek. Much nicer than I thought it would look like. Pushes down smoothly
customer_reviews.author: L. Denktas

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the worst toaster I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is 2 weeks old, and both outside burners have quit working, tonight half the inner burners stop working. This thing if defective, and useless now.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas in Wa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Toaster
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this for a couple of months now, with great results. The settings are convenient. Plain toast comes out perfectly on the suggested setting. We've toasted bagels and muffins, too, all come out perfectly. We replaced a similar toaster, also a Hamilton Beach, that we had used for at least 15 years. This one seems just as good. We're happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: embecker

customer_reviews.title: The entire top part of the toaster gets super hot. I don’t recommend this for safety reasons
customer_reviews.text: The entire top part of the toaster gets super hot. I don’t recommend this for safety reasons. I will be much more careful in checking out the design of my next toaster. Will be getting rid of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Seems flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Product not very sturdy, Feels cheap and lightweight. Does not have the extra lift mechanism that assists lifting toast free of wires. Not deep enough to toast the top of the larger sized breads like Orowheat.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: It's a good toaster
customer_reviews.text: This toaster does thin and thick breads, bagels, English muffins - all just as you want them. I am very happy with it. I haven't tried toasting frozen bread as it says will work, but expect it will do that also.
customer_reviews.author: snowbird12

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach 2 Slice Cool Touch Toaster (22121),Black
product_meta.description: Style Name:2-SliceMake perfect toast with the Hamilton Beach PerfectToast 2-Slice Toaster. With slots wide enough for bagels, waffles, and hand sliced bread and an automatic toast boost function, this toaster can fit all of your family's toasting needs.
feature_bullets: Wide 1.5" slots fit thick bagels, waffles & hand-sliced bread

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars2,904 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
